summary:
. Professional experience in IT for over 20 years, multilingual, fluent (oral and written) in Portuguese (native), English and Spanish

. Dual Citizenship (Brazillian / Italian).

. Dedicated to deliver leading edge technology solutions and consulting in transformation environments, for cross segment large companies (Telco, Finance and Oil & Gas) in national and international scale.

. Competence in managing application development projects, covering several platforms and languages, applying traditional discipline (CMM / PMI) or Agile (Scrum), especially in Big Data / Fast Data / Data Science.

. Expertise in IT Infrastructure Consulting projects -  Business Continuity, Datacenter Migration and Consolidation, Virtualization and Cloud Computing.  

. Flexible, adaptable, results driven profile, with experience and active participation as a leader of complex and innovative projects with simultenous coordination of multicultural teams, allocated in Brazil and abroad.

. Technical expertise in Cloud Computing and Big Data.

. Certifications: ATS Uptime Institute, Hong Kong, 2011; Business Continuity Coordinator, BCI, 2007; and Masters Degree in Project Management, George Washington University, 2004.

End to end solution, with infrastructure, hadoop ecosystem, Data Lake, development team and visual reports to the end user.

projects.title: Big Data Antifraud Consulting Project in Bradesco
projects.description:
Successful consulting project to detect fraud behavior in Bradesco. Challenging due to the very short project period - (8 weeks)
- Data collection and structuring using log files
- Data Science - Fraud detection algorithms application

. Role - Project Manager
. Location - Barueri - São Paulo

contributors.headline: Empowering People to Make Data-Driven Decisions

projects.title: SAP Replatform Consulting at Bradesco
projects.description:
Consulting project in Bradesco, focusing on 2 main aspects:
. SAP Mainframe Infrastructure - old fashioned infrastructure, where the idea was to plan a migration from the actual one (costly, highly dependent on one provider, with scalability issues, limited support, lack of DR / backup capabilities) to a current technology perspective (downsized, cheaper, scalable, easy to use, better support)
. SAP IT Organization Structure - understand current processes, structure - and define new roles and responsabilities, present a capability gap analysis and process improvement opportunities

Role: SAP infrastructue Consultant / Project Manager

Location: Sao Paulo

contributors.headline: IT Project Manager at Tata Consultancy Services

projects.title: Mainframe Migration Planning - Nossa Caixa
projects.description:
Migration planning of the Mainframe Systems for Nossa Caixa, a public bank in Brazil, providing not only the plan itself, but also EMC methodology in Datacenter Migration. Activities included:
. Data gathering  - HW, SW and services
. Application dependency mapping
. Current DR Plan evaluation
. Creation of Migration Plan

Role: Infrastructure Consultant

Location: Brasilia

projects.title: Information Lifecycle Management - BTG Pactual
projects.description:
Successfull consulting project in BTG Pactual, helping the customer to:
. Identify cost reduction opportunities in its storage infrastructure
. Build a new Storage Reference Arquitecture
. Establish a new process to classify data and evaluate its proper storage tier 

Role: IT Consultant

Location: Rio de Janeiro

projects.title: Orçamento e Planejamento da Migração para o Novo Datacenter - BM&FBOVESPA
projects.description:
BM&FBOVESPA built a new DC and needed to plan the migration of its pre-existent 3 DC´s, and to establish a budget for this consolidation. Activities included, but not limited to:
- Collect DC components (servers, switches, storage, SWs) and applications and create inventory
- Estimate growth for 3 years
- Plan migration in 3 years
- Create a financial analysis, considering HW acquisitions, Capex, Opex, ROI, HW transportation, hiring of consulting teams

. Role: DC Migration expert and Project Manager

. Location: São Paulo

projects.title: Datacenter Consolidation and Migration Planning for America Movil
projects.description:
Successfull strategy project, where the customer needed a short term analysis and some scenarios to consolidate its DataCenters in Latin America. It was necessary to evaluate all DCs, identify risks, exposures, alternatives, and propose scenarios, with business cases, to consolidate 12 DCs in 2 or 3.

Role: Financial Analyst

Location: Mexico City

projects.title: SAP IT Infrastructure in Petrobras
projects.description:
2 year engagement in Petrobras with SAP Basis Team, involving its 5 landscapes, in the major SAP environment in Brazil. Activities included, but not limited to:
. DR Planning
. DR Building
. DR Testing
. Application Migration Planning (from 3 DC´s to one New DC)

Roles: IT Infrastructure Consultant, BCDR Expert, Project Manager

Location: Rio de Janeiro

contributors.headline: Sr SAP Basis Admin / HANA Basis Architect

projects.title: Disaster Recovery Strategy for CNSF
projects.description:
CNSF is a Public Sector Company in Mexico, and they needed an IT DR Strategy to protect their systems and data. This project was designed to create a strategy, create a transition plan, with an RFP with appropriate budget to hire an external company to implement this strategy.

Role: BCDR Consultant

Location: Mexico City

projects.title: Estratégia de Migração dos Datacenters da Claro - Brasil
projects.description:
Evaluation of current Claro Datacenters in Brazil. This evaluation included faciities and IT compontents. Short term project to attend the urgency of Claro of having a clear Migration Strategy. The approach included:
. Facilities Evaluation - Risk Analysis
. Collecting all IT components
. Build a 5 year vision
. Macro Migration Plan
. Create 4 scenarios for decision - including financial analysis, risks and duration

Role: Consultant

Locations: Rio de Janeiro and Sao Paulo

profile_positions.title: IT Consultant

profile_positions.location: Rio de Janeiro e Região, Brasil
profile_positions.description:
Worked for 8.5 years with IT Strategy, helping EMC Consulting Services to extend and improve its portfolio in all Latin América.
. Consulting and Project Management in Big Data / Fast Data projects for Finance / Telco challenges, such as Anti-fraud, DW Architecture Replacement, Telco Use Cases.
. Consulting and Leadership in Business Continuity / Disaster Recovery projects in Latin America customers, in Finance / Oil & Gas industries.
. Consulting and Leadership in SAP infrastructure projects (BCDR, SAP Migration, Repurposing) for Finance / Oil & Gas customers.
. Datacenter Consolidation and Migration Consulting projects (strategy, budget, planning and execution) for Finance / Telco / Oil & Gas customers.
. Consulting in an IT infrastructure rationalization project, based on Information Lifecycle Management (ILM) framework, for a Finance customer.

KEY PROJECTS AND ACHIEVEMENTS
. Project Management in an innovative Big Data Initiative (US$ 10M) in a Telco customer, with the following actions:
. New platform with huge (120TB) repository and capable of initial 34 business reports development, addressing regulatory needs that no area had sufficient data or performance to resolve: 
   - Coordination of a multicultural technical team: 30 professionals from Taiwan, United States, India and Brazil.
   - Training and technical support. 
   - Negotiated a follow-up project extension generating 5x original-revenue
As a result, while driving the project, I took part in negotiating new demands, which led to the contract extension and the increase of the initial value, around five times.
. Project leader in an antifraud project (US$ 200K) for a financial institution. Big Data and Data Science approach achieving time-to-market deliverables.
. Datacenter Consolidation and Migration Planning for Finance institution (US$200K) and 2 Telcos in Latin America (U$300K) 
. SAP Infrastructure Consulting (US$500K) in an Oil & Gas customer, managing and delivering DR and Migration Plan
